breakfast.name: Mashed Banana with Plant-Based Milk
breakfast.preparation: Mash the banana thoroughly. Mix in the plant-based milk until it reaches a smooth, slightly liquid consistency. Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired.
breakfast.nutritionalBenefits: Provides easily digestible carbohydrates, potassium, and a small amount of calcium and vitamins. The softness is appropriate for someone of this size.
breakfast.healthNotes: Extremely small portions are necessary given the user's weight. This is just to provide a tiny amount of nutrition. Monitor for any digestive issues.

lunch.name: Pureed Sweet Potato
lunch.preparation: Steam or bake a small amount of sweet potato until very soft. Puree the sweet potato with the water until smooth.
lunch.nutritionalBenefits: Provides Vitamin A, fiber, and antioxidants. Easy to digest.
lunch.healthNotes: Extremely small portion due to weight. Monitor stool consistency.

dinner.name: Rice Cereal Porridge (Plain)
dinner.preparation: Cook rice cereal with water according to package directions, ensuring it forms a smooth, lump-free porridge. Cool slightly before serving.
dinner.nutritionalBenefits: Easily digestible carbohydrates and provides some energy.
dinner.healthNotes: Choose unfortified rice cereal to minimize potential reactions. Observe for any signs of allergy or intolerance.

snacks.name: Small amount of unsweetened applesauce
snacks.preparation: Serve a small spoonful of unsweetened applesauce.
snacks.healthNotes: Ensure applesauce is smooth and easily digestible. Monitor for gas or bloating.
